name: Sizzling Hot Deluxe Slot
description:
Play the cult fruit slot. If you’re a fan of simple gaming fun and great chances of winning, look no further than Sizzling Hot!

777 across the reels will light up the eyes of any slot fan, for the lucky number 7 has the highest winning value in Sizzling Hot™ deluxe!

Plus, make sure you keep a lookout for the Stars - they can trigger wins anywhere on the reels.

Sizzling Hot™ deluxe at a glance:
- 5 reels
- 5 win lines
- The Star is a special symbol (Scatter)

How do I get spinning at Sizzling Hot™ deluxe?
It couldn’t be simpler: Get the app, register at GameTwist, and away you go. What’s more, a wide variety of further awesome games is waiting for you at GameTwist!
